data.title: Tom Richards, horoscope for birth date 22 March 1948, born in Brisbane, with Astrodatabank biography
data.meta_description: Horoscope and astrology data of Tom Richards born on 22 March 1948 Brisbane, Australia, with biography
data.text:
Name

Richards, Tom Gender: M

Birthname Thomas Richards born on 22 March 1948 at 19:30 (= 7:30 PM ) Place Brisbane, Australia, 27s28, 153e02 Timezone AEST h10e (is standard time) Data source

From memory

Rodden Rating A Collector: Clifford

Astrology data 01°41' 23°39 Asc. 04°30'

Biography

Australian artist, cartoonist, journalist and actor. Richards trained in theatre before becoming a familiar face on TV with appearances in "Matlock Police" from February 1971 and "Sons and Daughters," from November 1981 thru mid-1986. He has also appeared in the film "Dawn," 1976. His relationships with Rowena Wallace and Belinda Giblin sent the show ratings through the roof. Richards returned to the final episode of "Sons and Daughters," filmed in April 1987.

Before his acting days, he was an active swimmer, footballer and artist.

Link to Wikipedia biography

associate relationship with Entertainment: Home and Away (born 17 January 1988). Notes: Played Graham Ridge, 1988

associate relationship with Entertainment: Sons and Daughters (born 18 January 1982). Notes: Played David Palmer, 1982-1987

associate relationship with Entertainment: The Box (born 11 February 1974). Notes: Played Greg Patterson, 1977
